name: Dr. Sofia Navarro
role: Radio Astronomer - Marcus's colleague and first ally
core_wound: Grew up in poverty in Santiago, fought for every educational opportunity. Lost her younger brother to gang violence - he believed in her when no one else did.
wants: To make her brother's sacrifice mean something - to contribute to human knowledge
needs: To accept that some fights can't be won alone - to share the burden of responsibility
voice_markers: Code-switches between English and Spanish when stressed
Direct, no-nonsense communication style - impatient with hedging
Uses stark metaphors ('We're standing on a cliff edge')
Interrupts people when they're wrong - doesn't sugarcoat
contradiction: Fierce advocate for collaboration but terrible at asking for help. Pushes others to be brave while hiding her own fears.
physical_description: Athletic build, closely cropped black hair, intense dark eyes. Always moving - taps fingers, paces while thinking. Wears practical field clothes.

relationships.Marcus Reid: Frustrated respect - sees his brilliance but annoyed by his timidity. Protective of him.
